Dear Mr. Ruppert: 

CPF 1-2023-027-NOPV 

From November 15, 2021, to November 19, 2021, via on-site inspection, representatives of the 
Pipeline  and  Hazardous  Materials  Safety  Administration  (PHMSA),  Office  of  Pipeline  Safety 
(OPS),  pursuant  to  Chapter  601  of  49  United  States  Code  (U.S.C.)  inspected  Eastern  Gas 
Transmission and Storage, Inc.’s (EGT&S) procedures and records for control room management 
of its control room in Bridgeport, West Virginia. 

As  a  result  of  the  inspection,  it  is  alleged  that  you  have  committed  probable  violations  of  the 
Pipeline Safety Regulations, Title 49, Code of Federal Regulations (CFR). The items inspected
